name: High Point XC Ski Center
description: In the shadow of the Monument, at the northern tip of New Jersey, is the High Point Cross Country Ski Center. We feature 17 km of groomed and 8k of ungroomed terrain across our 6 trails. Over 1600 feet in elevation guarantees that High Point is the snowiest spot in the metropolitan area. It’s “New England”, nearby! Discover an alpine hollow of lakes, trees, wildlife, and sweeping vistas.
